Class .Object .Inheritance .Functions .Properties .Ajax ( also known as AJAX ) , shorthand for " Asynchronous JavaScript and XML , " is a web development technique for creating interactive web applications .The intent is to make web pages feel more responsive by exchanging small amounts of data with the server behind the scenes , so that the entire web page does not have to be reloaded each time the user requests a change .
